segment.source: Targeted identification of Full Table Scans (FTS) and high-latency queries.

The Query Controller is dedicated to identifying "expensive" operations that degrade site performance. It specifically filters for queries utilizing Full Table Scans (FTS), which indicate that the database is reading every row in a table due to missing or suboptimal indexes. Additionally, the controller provides a curated list of the slowest queries recorded within the application scope. Unlike the global server slow-query log, this module focuses on application-level performance, making it an essential tool for developers during the refactoring and indexing phases.
